titleStmt.title: An order and declaration of His Highness the Lord Protector and his Privy Council, appointing a Committee for the Army, and receivers-general for the first six moneths assessment of thirty five thousand pounds by the moneth upon England, commencing the 24th of June, 1657 / Saturday 22⁰ August, 1657. Ordered by His Highness the Lord Protector, that this order and declaration be forthwith printed and published. Will: Jessop, clerk of the Council.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)

titleStmt.title: An order and declaration of His Highness the Lord Protector and his Privy Council, appointing a Committee for the Army, and receivers-general for the first six moneths assessment of thirty five thousand pounds by the moneth upon England, commencing the 24th of June, 1657 / Saturday 22⁰ August, 1657. Ordered by His Highness the Lord Protector, that this order and declaration be forthwith printed and published. Will: Jessop, clerk of the Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills and John Field, printers to His Highness the Lord Protector,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
